head: Our machinery in mould making
desc: Our machinery offers a wide range of options for precise and efficient manufacturing solutions. With state-of-the-art machining processes, we ensure that every tool fulfils the highest quality requirements.

services.title: Die sinking and wire erosion
services.text1: Our company has extensive experience in the machining of precise and complex geometries using state-of-the-art wire and die-sinking EDM technologies.

services.title: Milling
services.text1: Our main machines for the production of injection moulding tools are 3D CNC milling machines. The 3D models are created using PTC Creo software, which also enables the CNC machines to be controlled.

services.title: Grinding
services.text1: We use a high-quality surface grinding machine to achieve precise and flawless surfaces.
